Projects.title: E-Commerce Website
desc: Adaa-Jaipur is a comprehensive e-commerce platform designed to provide a seamless online shopping experience. It features an intuitive interface for customers and a robust admin panel for efficient product and order management.
This website was not built entirely by me alone. I utilized resources from YouTube, Google, and AI to enhance my learning and development process.

Projects.title: Myntra Clone
desc: A responsive Myntra-inspired e-commerce website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project features a user-friendly product listing page and a working 'Add to Cart' functionality using JavaScript, allowing users to add items to the cart and view them dynamically.
Designed with modern UI elements to replicate the look and feel of the original Myntra site.

Projects.title: Furniture - Website
desc: This Furniture E-Commerce Website is built using ReactJS, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, offering a fast, modern, and responsive user interface. The site features beautifully designed furniture product listings with smooth navigation and a clean, minimal UI optimized for all devices.

A key feature of this project is the 'Add to Cart' functionality developed using React state management. Users can add products to the cart, view selected items in real-time, and experience seamless interactions — all powered by efficient component-based architecture and Tailwind’s utility-first styling.
